DOC.brief_summary: This project aim evaluate consequence prenatal exposure neurotoxicants ( solvent , organophosphate pesticide ) develop brain , child age 10 12 year .
DOC.brief_title: PERINE : Effect Prenatal Exposure Neurotoxicants Developing Brain : MRI Study
DOC.criteria: Children include cohort PELAGIE Children participate study PEPSY Age 10 12 year ( pilot study ) Maternal smoking alcohol consumption pregnancy ( study group ) Children health event affect neurodevelopment Children treat methylphenidate , psychotropic antiepileptic
